titleInfo.title: Annual West Virginia Country Music Talent Contest (16563)

mods.abstract: Two color half sheet (red and black on white) announcing the Annual West Virginia Country Music Talent Contest with Johnny Duncan and Barbara Fairchild at Aunt Minnie's Farm and Country Roads Park on July 26-27. Poster features metal photoplates of Johnny Duncan and Barbara Fairchild. For additional information about this poster see https://digi.countrymusichalloffame.org/digital/collection/hatch3/id/32018.

recordInfo.recordContentSource: Country Music Hall of Fame and Museum
